text: Tsivilsky District (; ) is an administrativeLaw #28 and municipalLaw #37 district (raion), one of the twenty-one in the Chuvash Republic, Russia. It is located in the northeast of the republic and borders with Cheboksarsky District in the north and northwest, Mariinsko-Posadsky District in the northeast, Kanashsky District in the south, and with Krasnoarmeysky District in the west. The area of the district is . Its administrative center is the town of Tsivilsk. Population: The population of Tsivilsk accounts for 36.7% of the district's total population. ==History== The district was established on September 5, 1927. ==References== ===Notes=== ===Sources=== * * Category:Districts of Chuvashia __NOTOC__
title: Tsivilsky District
